alert.note: Alert for Lancaster; York (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 6:46PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT CENTRAL LANCASTER AND SOUTHEASTERN YORK COUNTIES THROUGH 745 PM EDT... At 646 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Columbia to 13 miles southeast of Parkville. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation possible. Locations impacted include... Lancaster, York, Columbia, Millersville, Willow Street, Red Lion, Spry, Dallastown, East York, Stonybrook-Wilshire, Shrewsbury, Tyler Run-Queens Gate, Strasburg, Mountville, Hallam, Wrightsville, Stewartstown, Glen Rock, Yorklyn and Jacobus. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
